attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: should it not be tax payers,to decide on what exspenses MP's get,.Also the civil service as a whole, public funds.It is reasonable to exspect  Parliamentry exspenses,to be inspected and run by public comitee's.It has been shown that far to many claims have been excessive.We call for public right of exspenditure to be shown by all members of Parliament.To be open to view by the public.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
